headline: Infidels 0 - 1 Shmucks: The Manager's Reaction
body: It's definitely not the result we were looking for today. I don't think the score repersents the effort the lads put in and I am disappointed in the outcome. We've definitly got to make impprovements on how we approach future games tactically. With this is mind, onwards and upwards to our next match on Monday.
author: Montgomery, Infidels F.C. Manager
